TopicTitle: Keep getting the Popup at game start to transmit data

Articles.Content:
Hi,

Latest Windows Version here from GOG.com

I keep getting the popup at start that KSP wants to send game progress data to the developers. Trying to deactivate this under Settings/General seems to have no effect.

My settings.cfg says:

CALL\_HOME = False

DONT\_SEND\_IP = False

SEND\_PROGRESS\_DATA = False

Yet I keep getting that popup, and it's becoming annoying...

regards

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126444-1-0-3-1-0-4-still-resets-all-settings-on-restart](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126444-1-0-3-1-0-4-still-resets-all-settings-on-restart)

Your settings.cfg got corrupted. Delete or rename (and unplug any joystick or gamepad) it and the game will generate a new one.

Wow, thanks for the quick and perfect answer. I didn't find this thread since my other settings all remain.

Yes, must have been caused by unplugging a joystick.
